page.title: 19People in the Upottery Area
page.content: As we have a number of farms in the area a lot of people live and work on farms or have jobs connected with farming.For example one person sells special feeds to farms in East Devon, another mends machinery.There are other types of work too:several builders ,an architect and even an agent for computers. A large proportion have lived in the area virtually all their lives or have moved only a short distance from other parts of the county or from Somerset which is very near. Quite a lot of people have moved into the area either to work or when they have retired.We found that many of the newcomers had previously lived in the Southern counties of England and many came from London.Several said that they had moved expecting to find a better quality of life in this area.
